channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei -- EMUI
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei -- EMUI

item.title: CVE-2022-31754|2024-08-03T07:26:01.160Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: Logical defects in code implementation in some products. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect the availability of some features.

item.title: CVE-2022-31761|2024-08-03T07:26:01.075Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: Configuration defects in the secure OS module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability will affect confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2022-31752|2024-08-03T07:26:01.101Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: Missing authorization vulnerability in the system components. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability will affect confidentiality.
